name: Lovestruck Spider
description:
EDIT: Well, it looks like I managed to hide the secret "main idea" too well. If anybody finds it, let me know!

(no audio)

*If browser version lags, try the downloadable version.*

You're a small spider, climbing your way up to meet your mate. Avoid bees and centipedes.

Move with arrow keys, hide/unhide with z.

Made for Wowie Jam 2.0, hosted by Jonas Tyroller.  https://itch.io/jam/wowie-jam-2 The jam's theme was "Intentional Bugs". I used more than one interpretation of the theme.

Didn't have time to implement audio.

A very short, but very difficult game... or is it?

Inspired by "Riddle of the Sphinx" for Atari 2600.

This was my third game jam within a week. Could use a rest.
